resources.string:
Version 1.0.1
 - Add Chinese traslation support
 - Optimize color algorithms
 - Optimize logic
 - Add more helps
 - Add Intro Activity
 
 
 
 From now on,Medianotification that uploaded to Coolapk Market will be under my maintain.Thanks for everybody's support.
 When you have a good idea or find a bug,please reported to my Github but not Coolapk Market's comment area,which will make it difficult to trace and fix.
 However,if you dont have a Github account,then you can only post your idea in comment area,but dont forget to @me
 You can find my github URL at "help"
 
 Version 1.0.0
